availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Anna Maria "Mary" Barth Vonderheide (Resident of Louisville, Kentucky)

body.p: Dubois County, Indiana, housekeeper. Native of Prussia. Married to Henry Vonderheide in Louisville on May 3, 1859. Mother of Peter Vonderheide and Joseph Vonderheide. Housekeeper in Dubois County in 1860. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Dubois County, Bainbridge, p. 954.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Dubois County, Bainbridge, p. 21B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000819610, p. 396.
_ Indiana, Wills and Probate Records, 1798-1999_, Indiana County, District, and Probate Courts, Dubois County Circuit Court, wills Records, 1841-1882, p. 397 of microfilm (Accessed through ancestry.com on March 3, 2020).
KYR-0001-029-0550.
